archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Investigate Billing Event Related Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Investigate problems related to billing event records. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory The purpose of the Investigate Billing Event Related Problem process is to investigate problems related to billing event records. Where reporting indicates problems with billing event records such as data format errors, configuration problems, system or network problems this process initiates and manages an investigation and follow-up of the indicated problems. Optional Not used for this process element
